name: Verdan
description: Verdan owe their existence to chaos. Descendants of goblins and hobgoblins, transformed by the shadow of That-Which-Endures, they are the newest race of Faer√ªn.

ability_score_increase.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

age.description: Verdan reach adulthood at age 24 and live up to 200 years. None have yet reached old age, so the top age is speculative.

alignment.description: Verdan are usually good aligned. Due to their newness, there is not yet a well-established framework for their alignment.

size.description: Verdan are between 3 and 4 feet tall at the start. Your size is Small until you reach 5th level, where you undergo a 2-foot growth spurt and become Medium.

speed.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

black_blood_healing.description: When you roll either 1 or 2 on any Hit Die, you can instantly re-roll the die and take the new roll.

limited_telepathy.description: You can telepathically speak to any creature within 30 feet. You do not have to share a language to speak, but they must be able to speak a language. You can only communicate simple ideas.

persuasive.description: Your people's lack of history makes you trustworthy and humble. You have proficiency in the Persuasion skill.

telepathic_insight.description: You have advantage on all Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.

languages.description: You can speak, read, and write Common, Goblin, and one additional language.
